name: Hoarding Simulator
description:
one of the best high-tech simulation ever created is here! you must collect some items for you, that's it, gotta collect 'em all. a third person style with one objective, collect everything! you are in a pacific town but a lot of crazy events can be the most terrifying experience to you!

Features:
- real life physics, see the best physics ever made.
- local co-op, double troubles!
- partial controller support (tested with xbox controller)
- day night system
- your decisions can change everything!
- you can train in outdoor gym to be stronger and hold heavy items
- totally caos when your friendship with the society is low
- more than 20 grabablle items, sice post mails to peoples
